name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Delivery Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in software development and project delivery, specializing in **Python**, **SQL**, and **Azure DevOps**. Proficient in data modeling, analysis, and ETL/ELT processes, ensuring optimal data flow and integration across various platforms. Skilled in managing database systems with **PostgreSQL** and **MS SQL**, and utilizing version control with **GIT**. Demonstrated expertise in facilitating teamwork using **Jira** for project tracking, **Miro** for visual collaboration, and proficient in **MS Office Suite** for effective communication and presentation.

As a full-stack developer, I have utilized technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to create efficient, high-performance solutions. My experience with **Azure** and **AWS** cloud services has played a critical role in developing scalable and compliant applications that adhere to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I have led projects that incorporate AI/ML technologies for predictive analytics and automation, showcasing my ability to integrate advanced solutions into enterprise-grade platforms.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and managed complex SQL queries for data analysis and reporting, optimizing performance for large datasets across **PostgreSQL** and **MS SQL** databases.
- Utilized **Python** for automating ETL processes, ensuring efficient data extraction, transformation, and loading in line with business requirements.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Jira** for project management, ensuring efficient communication and timely delivery of software solutions.
- Developed deployment pipelines and infrastructure management scripts using **Azure DevOps**, enhancing continuous integration and delivery for multiple projects.
- Conducted data modeling and analysis for better decision-making through comprehensive reports created in **MS Office Suite** and visualized with **Miro** for project planning.
- Managed Windows and iOS environments, implementing necessary configurations and troubleshooting to maintain operational efficiency.
- Led the design and implementation of data architectures meeting business intelligence needs while employing best practices in data governance and security.
- Streamlined project workflows and improved team collaboration by facilitating clear communication and feedback mechanisms among stakeholders.
- Established robust version control using **GIT**, ensuring all code changes were tracked and auditable across development environments.

Utilized **SQL** and **PostgreSQL** to analyze financial data, ensuring integrity and performance of data queries for high-volume transaction systems.
Leveraged **Python** alongside ETL strategies to build and orchestrate pipelines using Apache Airflow and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time ingestion from both internal and third-party sources, resulting in a **30%** increase in data processing efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, using **Azure DevOps**, **Jira**, and **Miro** to enhance project communication and streamline workflows, achieving a **25%** reduction in project delivery timelines.
Implemented data modeling techniques to support accurate analysis and reporting in financial platforms, enhancing data-driven decision-making processes.
Developed and maintained documentation within **MS Office Suite**, ensuring clear communication of technical processes to non-technical stakeholders.
Adopted **GIT** for version control and collaborative coding, ensuring a robust development workflow and reducing conflicts by **40%**.
Executed data analysis projects that incorporated **data analysis** and business insights driven by effective communication methodologies with stakeholders.
Utilized **Powershell** on Windows and **iOS** platforms for automation of repetitive tasks, improving overall operational efficiency by **20%**.

Utilized **SQL** to perform data analysis and modeling, ensuring efficient data flow and structured data integration for various high-stakes projects.
Developed and optimized backend services with **Python**, addressing client needs and improving overall system performance through effective communication and agile methodologies in collaboration tools like **Jira**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps** to automate deployment processes, achieving continuous integration, and reducing deployment time by **30%**.
Conducted data gathering and analysis through **MS SQL** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high data quality and consistency while supporting business intelligence initiatives with actionable insights.
Managed project workflows and documentation using tools such as **MS Office Suite** and **Miro**, enhancing team collaboration and project tracking.
Utilized **Powershell** for automated tasks and streamlined operations, improving efficiency in delivery processes across different environments, including **Windows** and **iOS**.
Participated in the ETL and ELT processes to transform raw data into meaningful insights for strategic decision-making, ensuring data integrity and reliability.
Engaged with cross-functional teams to improve communication channels, fostering a collaborative environment that leads to enhanced project delivery and customer satisfaction.
Leveraged version control systems like **GIT** to manage and track changes effectively, ensuring version consistency across development and production environments.
